Three Base funciton
  1. Transmission Group(TGs)
    * Mutil-Link TG
      - Common Path Control
    * Parallel TGs
      - Separate Path Control
      
  2. Network Addressable Unit(NAU)
    * NAU names must be unique within an APPN environment. To ensure this uniqueness, a consistent naming convention is very important.
    
  3. addressing and session identifiters
    * The address used in an HPR/IP transmission header includes not only the HPR session identifier, but also the IP address of the participating endpoint.
